title: veTri tarum vaDivEl
sahitya:
veTri tarum vaDivEl irukkaiyil shaTrum kavalaippaDAdE manamE


anupallavi

  uTra tuNai umai bAlan uNarttirukka maTravai yAvumE manam uvandaruL kai


caraNam    danti mukham tiru taNigai param tiru svAmi malaiyuDan pazhamudir shOlaiyum
azhagAna pazhaniyil anupattam nIkkinai amarndaruL puriyum Ananda kandanin kai
